title: As a BOC Admin, I want the English Boilerplate for First Year International MNCs Updated
custom_preconds:
AC:

* The current English boilerplate of the First Year International Minor Contract will be swapped out for the new boilerplate in the attached file

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the UEC Expiration Batch updated
custom_preconds:
Context: There are no longer UEC being entered, so the batch will need to be updated.

AC:

* Batch will be updated to look at end years on ASGEE transactions
* Once a ASGEE has reach the end year of the contract, and no option years are exercised, the batch will create a Remove From Org tx
* There are still valid UEC in ebis that have not expired, they will need to be expired by the batch following current logic

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Elig for Dugout Utility Updated to Pull Position / Title From ASGEE
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, the Eligible for Dugout Utility pulls certain fields from UECs.  There will no longer be UECs.

AC:

* The Contract Position column will be renamed to â€œPositionâ€�
* The Title and Position fields will be updated to pull from ASGEE transactions instead of UECs

Note: The Eligible for Dugout Utility should be fully regressed as part of this.  Itâ€™s worth confirming none of the ASGEE updates has unforeseen impacts on the utility.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want at time componenet added to the Reserve List System Date
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, there is a time associated with the Reserve List Deadline (6pm) but the system date does not have a time entry.  As a result, EBIS treats the midnight as the deadline.

AC:

* The Reserve List system date will have a time component added.
* The date/time picker will work as expected, consistent with the other system dates with time components.

title: Create Audit Log for Insurance updates
Migrate the System Dates screen to React
custom_preconds: Recreate the System Dates screen in React

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Koren Boilerplate Included in MNCs if the Player Speaks Korean
custom_preconds:
AC:

* If a player has their language set to Korean on their profile, the Korean version of the mUPC will be printed along with the english
* This will work similar to existing functionality for Spanish language

title: As a MNC Admin, I want EBIS to prevent users from entering years into terms that are not covered by the contract
custom_preconds:
AC:

* On submit, the system will perform a check on all terms to verify that all years entered are covered the term of the contract.
** Example: if a contract covering 2024 is created, EBIS will not allow 2023 terms
* If the check fails, Clubs will receive a hard error and BOC will receive an overridable warning:
** *Title:* Error
** *Body:* This contract contains terms for years not covered by the contract.  Please very if the years entered are accurate and reach out to the BOC for assistance.
** *Buttons:* Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a MNC Admin, I want a Add C auto created for players outrighted after MN season
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21357|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-21357|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a player is outrighted after the completion of the MN Season, and the player has a MJC covering the following year and the player is NOT an Attachment 43 player, the system will autocreate an Add C for the next year in Tendered State
* When a player is outrighted after the completion of the MN Season, and the player does NOT have a MJC covering the following year and the player is NOT an Attachment 43 player, the system will autocreate a blank Add C for the next year in Preliminary State

title: Migrate Adv Search to React
custom_preconds: Adv search page should work the same in ebisui and ebisapp

title: As a WLP Admin, I want a Date Filter added to the WLP Club Comm Screen in EBIS
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, the WLP - Club Comm widget returns all reports ever created.  Users would like to export a smaller amount of reports.

AC:

* There will be a date range filter added to the header of the Reports widget on the WLP - Club Comm dashboard
* The beginning of the date range will default to Current Date - 6 Months
* The end of the date range will default to Current Date

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to mark an Employee as Designated and Upload a Contract on the Employee Roster widget
custom_preconds:
Date Discovery:[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3220832522/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Roster+Widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3220832522/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Roster+Widget|smart-link] 

Wires: [https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster&g=1|https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster&g=1|smart-link]  / [https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report&g=1|https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report&g=1|smart-link] 



AC:

* There will be an edit button in the footer of the Employee Roster widget
** Clicking Edit will put the widget into edit mode
* When in Edit mode, the there will be a checkbox available for any employee who is marked as Contracted on the most recent ASGEE
* Designating an employee will make the upload icon in the Contract column available
** Clicking the upload icon will allow the user to upload an executed contract
* When a contract is successfully uploaded, there will be a paper clip icon displayed
** Clicking the icon will open the attachment
* In the event an employee with an uploaded contract is un-designated, their contract will remain attached
* Clicking Save will commit changes and return the widget to view mode
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
** If they confirm, changes will be dismissed and widget will be returned to view mode

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the the Employee Roster Widget Updated
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3220832522/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Roster+Widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3220832522/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Roster+Widget|smart-link] 

Wires: [https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster&g=1|https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster&g=1|smart-link]  / [https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report&g=1|https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=update_roster_report&g=1|smart-link] 

AC:

* Employee Status and Roster Status columns will be removed
* The following columns will be added to match the data discover:
** Title
** Contracted
** Designate
** End Year
** Option Year(s)
** Contract
